tool_description: Top breaking news/trends from around the globe featuring sentiment analysis and specified major headlines as well as many more datapoints to come. Updated every 20 minutes.
name: Smart Curator
title: Smart Curator

api_list.name: Headlines
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-curator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/?action=current&pretty=true&dataonly=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-curator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-curator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/?action=current&pretty=true&dataonly=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-curator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
